description:
Whether you’re lounging around a campfire, or on your couch, these stretchy pants guarantee comfort. Using a midweight blend of polyester and Lyocell, the Vieno II pants have a cottony softness with benefits of a synthetic.

  • Quick-drying and wicking poly blend uses Lyocell for added comfort, and a hint of spandex for an easy stretch
  • drirelease® lyocell wicks away moisture
  • Elasticised adjustable waist makes it easy to find your perfect fit
  • Dual hand pockets and a zippered patch pocket for security
  • Ribbed cuffs keep the warm in and the chilly out
name: Indyeva Vieno II Pant - Women's
